content: beginner-friendly mixed stitch crochet blanket pattern us & uk terms included | resizable from baby to king size **description ** looking for a fun beginner-friendly crochet project this **mixed stitch blanket pattern** combines a variety of easy crochet stitches in one striped design making it perfect for learning new techniques while creating a cozy blanket the pattern comes with **two pdf downloads** * **us terms** version * **uk terms** version you ll also find **resizing instructions** for five blanket sizes from baby to king plus tips for adjusting the pattern using different yarn weights and crochet hooks whether you re using scrap yarn or planning a specific color palette this pattern is a **stash-busting favorite** and makes a thoughtful handmade gift for family and friends **pattern includes ** * 2 pdf files **us terms** & **uk terms** * beginner-friendly row-by-row instructions * resizing guide for **baby throw twin queen and king sizes** * instructions for resizing with **different yarn weights and hook sizes** * detailed stitch terminology guide with beginner tips * standalone **stitch diagram** available as an additional download * 136 row of beautiful mixed stitches **sizing ** finished size using **dk yarn** * **72 x 92 inches / 185 x 235 cm** king size resizing instructions allow you to **add or remove stitch repeats** in multiples of 12 to achieve the following sizes * baby * throw * twin * queen * king **yarn & materials ** * **yarn weight ** double knit / dk yarn recommended * approx **3600 yards** for king size varies by size * crochet hook **us g/6 4mm / uk size 8** * works well with leftover yarn ensure all yarns used are the **same weight** for a neat finish **skill level ** beginner to confident beginner all stitches are explained in the pattern **language ** pattern available in **english** includes **us terms** and **uk terms** versions **format ** pdf download instant access after purchase
